article_title: More than 250 area students participate in First Southwest Va. LEGO regional tournament
article_text:

og.description: ABINGDON, Va. — Seventeen teams with names like Chaos, Order of the Nerds and Beast Mode Bananas crowded the Southwest Virginia Higher Education Center on Saturday to take part in a regional LEGO robotics tournament.
